data.text: Think you might've overdone it?

data.text: I followed the instructions to the letter.

data.text: Maybe it triggered a reaction with the mako?

data.text: Well, let's hope this city's still in one piece.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I mean...this must've helped some.

data.text: After all that, it'd better have.

data.text: Anyway, let's get going. We in Sector 8?

data.text: That'd be just down there!

data.text: All right, then. Lead the way.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You got it!

data.text: She's good to go.

data.text: Attention all citizens. Attention all citizens. This is an alert from the Shinra Emergency Operations Center.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Unidentified intruders have detonated a bomb inside Mako Reactor 1.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Multiple explosions have been confirmed, as well as ongoing fires.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: In response, a disaster warning has been issued in Sectors 1 and 8.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Structures in the area are at high risk of collapse, rendering the entire sector hazardous.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Therefore, all residents of Sector 8 are to evacuate immediately.
No... No way.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: This couldn't have been us...could it?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: But what if it was...?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: What's done is done.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Merc's right.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text:
It ain't pretty, but we can't stop now.
This was just the first reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And the planet won't be safe till we get the rest.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah... We always knew this was gonna get messy.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: And this is only the beginning...
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Y'all gotta look at the bigger picture here. Nothing worth fighting for was ever won without sacrifice.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Though you may not be crying out, I know you're in pain─just like the planet.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But it's okay, 'cause I'm here for you!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: To help take the load off your shoulders!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Your fears... Your worries... Your concerns...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And yes, your fees...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Whatever your problem, I got you.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So, what's our next move, boss?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: That's easy enough!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We get our asses home!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yoo-hoo.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I don't need to tell you what this is, right?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Of course not. It's healing materia.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You can have it. For saving my life.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just doing my job. Nothing more.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Yeah, yeah...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Fact is, I'm lucky you were there.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Survival can be a matter of luck or skill.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: And you can't rely on luck.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Words to live by!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Yeah, well...thanks.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You do know how to use it, right?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You do know what I was, right?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What the...?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You're not real... You're...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: ...dead!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I am?
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: I killed you with my own─
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, you need not remind me.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: It was the crowning moment of our time together.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: But that was then, and this is now. I have a favor to ask.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Our beloved planet is dying.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Slowly. Silently. Painfully.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Can you bear to see the planet suffer...
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Cloud?
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Mom... Mom...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Were the planet to die, so many things would be lost. Your hometown that burns so bright...
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: The sound of her voice pleading for me to spare you.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: The shiver of her flesh yielding to cold steel.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: That which binds us together would be no more. And I would be loath to live in such a world.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Which is why I must ask you this one favor.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Don't worry. It's a simple thing.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Run, Cloud... Run away.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: You have to leave... You have to live.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: You bastard!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Good, Cloud. Very good.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Hold on to that hatred.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: I'm seeing things. Fumes from all the mako, maybe.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: All right. You got this.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You are too weak to save anyone.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Not even yourself.
data.speaker: Sephiroth

data.text: Are you okay!?

data.text: Hey... Are you okay?
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: I'm fine.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Here. This is for you.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: A flower?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's right. It's a gift.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: You know, for scaring those things away.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: What things?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Never mind. Think of it as a memento.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Just my luck...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I heard that, you know.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: How much?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well, that depends on the customer.

data.text: It's on the house.

data.text: In your case...
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: I'm good.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, don't be like that. I know you want one.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: When was the last time you saw a real flower, huh?
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Plus, it'll make your girlfriend's day. I guarantee it.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Enough already. I'll give you two gil for it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Two measly gil!? For a real flower?
Come on.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Five then.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Please, that's not nearly enough.

data.text: Besides, I clearly said it was on the─
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: You're trying to get rid of me! For five lousy gil!
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Sorry, but your plan won't work.
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Lovers used to give these when they were reunited...
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Look, I'm involved in things.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Dangerous things.

data.text: Oh, I'm sure you are. So?
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: So keep your distance.

data.text:
Wait─you think someone's out to get you?
Is that what you're all worked up about?
data.speaker: Flower Peddler

data.text: Relax.

data.text: No one's going to attack you. I promise.

data.text: How much?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well, that depends on the customer.

data.text: It's on the house.

data.text: In your case...

data.text: Here. This is for you.
How much?
I'm good.
In your case... It's on the house.
Don't be stupid.
Fine, I'll take it.

data.text: Mmm, you think he's a keeper?

data.text: On my go.

data.text: Ugh, you had me worried for a minute...

data.text: What the hell you been up to? Huh!?

data.text: Giving Public Security the runaround, that's what.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Had to draw them away from the station somehow.

data.text: Nicely done.

data.text: Well─can't argue with results, huh?

data.text: Wait.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Got a question for you all.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ever been attacked by an invisible enemy?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Wearing robes. Came and went like the wind.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Thought they were invisible...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: They were─at first. Only saw them after she grabbed me...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: A new Shinra weapon, maybe?

data.text: Hah! More like a panic-induced hallucination!

data.text: Never mind. Forget I said anything.

data.text: Suit yourself. C'mon, let's move up.

data.text: What kind of maniacs would go so far as to bomb a reactor?
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: They've yet to announce it publicly, but I heard it was Avalanche's doing.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Really? Aren't they the terrorists who tried to kill the president?
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: Is there nothing they won't do?
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: Hey! Quit talking out your ass.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Everyone knows Avalanche only cares about saving the planet.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: J-just who do you think you are?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: A law-abiding concerned citizen.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: "Law-abiding"? Really?
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: Don't antagonize him!
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: In my humble opinion, that explosion was a message─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: a message to the bastards bleeding our planet dry.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think they got it? Heard it loud and clear? Y'all's masters?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We will not submit to intimidation or violence!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: But work together for peace and prosperity!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: That is how civilized people change the world!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: That's right!
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: That is the Shinra creed!
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: Hmph. Them's fighting words.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's what we believe.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: We all have to follow our conscience, don't we?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: We should go.
data.speaker: Shinra Employee

data.text: Right...
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Let's get this out of the way...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Personally, I find visual aids make the dull stuff a lot more bearable.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: If it helps, think of it as an initiation rite.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: How many times do I have to tell you people. I'm not─
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There's such a thing as playing too hard to get.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So, here we've got a wireframe model of the great city of Midgar.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Complete with massive steel plates suspended three hundred meters above ground level...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Atop which stands a shining beacon of civilization.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: The whole system is sustained by the mako reactors, which feed the insatiable appetites of the public.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: The train will be passing through an ID checkpoint shortly.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: This here is the train's route.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: As you can see, it'll take us around this main pillar.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Look─we're about halfway through it now.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: They've set up a checkpoint here to scan the IDs of all passengers heading in and out.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Date of birth, residential status, criminal history...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: All that and more is automatically cross-referenced in their databases.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Public Security wouldn't have it any other way.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Heads up.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Don't worry. Our IDs are impeccable.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: What'd I tell you? Have a little faith.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Won't be long till we reach the bottom. Relax.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Take a good look. It's because of that great big pizza in the sky that people down there gotta struggle to survive.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Shinra sucks up mako while the soil turns to dust, the air fills with smog, and the flowers die.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Then leave and don't look back.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's what's always worked for me.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hmph! Well, that's all well and good if you're only out for yourself.

data.text: Like this train, I suppose...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There's only one way it can go...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: But the folks down there don't have the luxury of choice, you know?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That's about as good a place as any.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Stand back then. I'll set the bomb.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Can't wait to see you, Marlene.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Can't wait to take a hot shower.

data.text: There he is! You're not going anywhere!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: HQ, this is Sector 8 Unit 4. We have eyes on the target!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: We need backup! I repeat: this is 8-4 requesting immediate backup!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Box him in! Box him in!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: There's nowhere to run!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Watch out for live wires. They're everywhere.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Ugh, the air in here reeks. Can't wait to get out in the open!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Man, what is that? I've never smelled anything so foul.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Aw, it's me.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Gotta do something about that, and soon.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: How much farther do we have to go?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Not far!

data.text: Was it the mako density? The primary explosive? The blasting agent?

data.text: Hey, we can figure that out later.

data.text: You can refuel at the base.

data.text: Next time, I'll have to bring a little pick-me-up.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: It doesn't make any sense...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: The explosion triggered a reaction with the mako. You said so yourself.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That was my first guess─but shouldn't a reactor have fail-safes to prevent that kinda thing?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You mentioned "invisible enemies" back there, right?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hmm... No.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I'm just looking for excuses for something that was clearly my own fault.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Gotta own up to it if I'm gonna learn from this and move on.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Thanks, Cloud. You're a good listener.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Quit acting like a damn kid. I ain't in the mood.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You got somewhere you need to be?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Don't wander off, huh?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Cloud! Over here.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You hear that suit? "Shinra creed" my ass.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We're the good guys, dammit...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: They'd probably kill us if they knew we were the ones responsible...
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: No─don't think about it.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Well, I get it if you can't relate...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Shower might help. A long, hot one...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Cloud! Up here! Look up! I said look up!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I give up. If you ever get up here, just be careful you don't fall, okay?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You doing this on purpose? I'm on top of the rubble!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Not that way. Right!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I said "look up"!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: A little more to the left!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Okay now, if you look straight down...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Target sighted. I repeat, target sighted.
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Shock troopers, prep for immediate deployment!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Troopers on standby!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: You are clear to engage!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Ground forces engaging target in fountain plaza! All nearby units converge and provide immediate support!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Be advised─target is headed for the station!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Requesting immediate reinforcements at fountain plaza!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Target still mobile! Support, proceed to rally point at the station.
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Find another way...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Use the rooftops, maybe...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Be advised─target approaching residential area. Seal all access immediately!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Enemy combatant─you are surrounded! Lay down your weapon and surrender!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: Enemy combatant─you have been warned! Surrender yourself to Public Security immediately!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: You have nowhere to run!
data.speaker: Shinra Helicopter

data.text: I felt that one in my guts...
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: They just keep on coming.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: We need to get out of this place.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Don't let the intruder escape!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: He must be close.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What in the hell are we supposed to do?
It's just a dream. Just a bad dream...
A bombing? No, this can't be happening. No way.
The ground started shaking...then the sign just...fell.
You don't think this was...Wutai, do you?
Burned to the ground...
How're trains still running?
Don't even wanna think about if there was a mako spill...
Think it was those eco-terrorists?
Where do I go...?
Damn it, that hurts...
Who would bomb a reactor?
Hope Sector 7's all right...
I should just hop a train.
This is all too much!
Hurry it up! We got fires all over!
Damn it!
Why did this have to happen!?
Enough chitchat! Focus!
Where are they!?
Should be on their way!
"Should be"!?
Not enough firefighters and medics to go around right now! Don't get your hopes up!
Like I would!
Thought the whole plate was gonna collapse...
It's like the end of the world...
Haha, now I've seen everything...
Why...? Tell me why!
The ground was moving so much...it was all I could do to stay standing...
I can't stop shaking...
My ears are still ringing from the blast...
No use taking the car. Gonna have to go on foot.
My friend's gone to the station, but...
Someone tell me what's going on!
What kind of assholes'd do this!?
No, this can't be happening!
I need to get to a shelter. Fast!
The nearest shelter. Where is it!?
We're supposed to be safe up here!
I lost sight of my girlfriend!
Any way to get to Sector 3?
Goddammit!
Help me!
Please...I can't take it anymore...
I'm screwed...
The ground started shaking...and then...
All I wanna do is go home...
My store's ruined...
We need to get out of here.
But we don't know where the shelter is...
Is he gonna be okay?
He'll be at the station...
But what if he's not?
Where are you!?
Wherever he is, he's safe. I know it.
I hope you're right...
Is this for real!?
I just started working at the reactor...
Did those terrorists do this?
Is the station safe?
I just wanna go home...
So this is it, huh?
Just let it be over...
Thought the trains had stopped...
My life flashed before my eyes!
Everything was, like, shaking, man!
Hell is this bombing shit!?
Are the trains running!?
Somebody... Show a guy to the station, huh!?
I don't know where to go...
This is a nightmare!
This isn't happening... This isn't happening...
The reactor... It just...
I can't...
There's no coming back from this...
My boyfriend just left me here...
I heard the streets are full of rubble...
How could someone bomb the reactor?
The reactor's fine.
What're you talking about!?
Just a bad dream...
The day started out so normal...
Like so many dreams...
Will you stop saying that!?
Hey, can you hear me?
If you can, give us a sign!
Got someone in need of medical attention.
Send a stretcher!
Don't worry, we'll get you looked at soon enough.
Pretty sure the guys from Sector 7 are on their way.
Once they get here, could you─ Exactly! Thanks!
It's okay, you're safe now!
Got a patient with me. Has trouble walking.
Need a stretcher!
ASAP!
We'll get you to a doctor soon. Hang in there.
Can you hear me!?
Where's that stretcher?
Where are you?
No dice. It's a shitshow over there too.
Keep hounding them!
Get over here!
Someone do something...
Are they ever going to stop...?
Why do I have to evacuate?
No...
Where do I evacuate to!?
They said to run, but to where?
This is too much...
Car's no use, so what do I do...?
Go on without me. I can't walk on it.
Then I'll carry you.
Cut the tough guy act.
I'm serious.
Help's on the way.
Better come soon...
We'll be fine...once the ground stops moving.
Help has to be on the way.
Shinra wouldn't just leave us to die, would they?
No. They'd never do that.
Do you really think it was a bomb?
I don't know. Might've just been a rumor.
Yeah, probably...
We'll never catch our train now!
There has to be another way.
Well, you're welcome to look!
The plate's...not going to collapse, is it?
People are saying it was Wutai.
I refuse to believe it was terrorists.
Any moment now the plate could just give out...
I have nowhere to go...
I don't want to die!
I was supposed to meet my friend at the station. She's waiting for me. But I...I can't get to her!
Lots of people are leaving by train...
Why did this have to happen?
There'll be nothing left but ash...
Cars are no good?
The station, you say?
What did we do to deserve this!? Someone tell me!
The roads are blocked!
Is that what mako smells like?
Why won't Public Security help us!?
My house is in pieces!
Our house... My office!
Why did this have to happen to us!?
They'd better make this right...
Who the hell are "they"?
Somebody!
Get back!
What!? Why!?
Wake me up.
Calm down, honey.
Wake me up from this.
Why'd this happen?
There's a reason...
Oh yeah, like what!?
I don't know.
Please...someone...help me!
What if the plate collapses!?
Why'd it have to be this sector?
I wanna leave this place...
I thought it was an accident...but they're saying it was an attack!
I just wanted to go to work, and do my job...
They're evacuating people by train!
I don't know the way to the station...
What if I can't get home?
I need to get back on solid ground!
Are the trains really running?
The tremors...
I can't handle all this shaking.
Get me out of here.
No getting past all that.
How do they expect us to get out!?
The military should be here!
This... This is unforgivable!
Shinra's enemy is our enemy.
My daughter and her husband should be here soon...
I'm so tired...
Someone help me to the station.
I can't reach my son...
Tell me it's all a dream.
This can't be real.
Without the reactor, we're in trouble.
Hope the slums are all right.
All the roads are blocked.
Is there a shelter around?
My son lives on one of the streets down there.
I was on my way to see my grandson when─
Hey, you alright?
You can still walk!?
How are you okay!?
What in the world?
Are you hurt?
That was terrifying...
That was insane.
Goodness me...
The danger's not passed.
Look at all this debris... It's worse than the slums.
The whole house started shaking. Just like that!
Why, oh why...
It was my grandson's birthday today...
This is the end...
I don't even know what to think...
I knew I shouldn't have worked late.
Stop whining.
We're gonna be fine. As long as the trains are running, we can get home.
Once we've got our breath back, let's head to the station.
Why bother?
Because we're not dead yet.
My son told me he'd be back soon...but...
Oh, how the ground shook...
I can't use my car?
I could never hope to climb all that.
We have to get out of here.
It was so loud...and everything was shaking...
Out of the blue, the road...it just...
I'm at my wit's end.
Tell me: are we at war?
Is there any way off the plate?
Midgar will never be the same...
Stamp will save us...!
The plate isn't gonna break, is it?
Where's my daddy?
What if the plate falls? Will we...?
The shelf tipped over and I went "Ah!" and I jumped out of the way.
We're not going to die...are we?
Where are you, Mom!?
Where'd they go?
Have you seen my baby brother!?
I have to get home.
Are there any trains going to the slums!?
What if the trains have stopped!?
No! Not our house!
It's on fire...
Daddy...
So what, do we dig our way through...? Nah, that's a death wish.
Goddamn rubble... The station's right over there!
If I try to climb that crap, something bad's gonna happen, I just know it.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Station's so close, yet so far...
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: You're askin' for it if you try to climb over that.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: What do we do now?
We head for the station. Then we take the train to your sister's.
I'm scared.
I know it's scary, but we'll be okay.
Where is he?
When's Dad coming back?
Anytime now.
No more! Please! I can't take this!
It's okay. You're gonna be fine.
Everything I had...it's all gone!
Try not to think about it.
We're all going to die!
Don't worry, Shinra will save us.
They'll make everything better again.
I wanna go home.
Is the surface okay?
The normal road got blocked.
I must be seeing things...
Oh my, I think that's about to give way too...
If you really want to get to the station, you can always climb those stairs. Try picking your way across the rubble...
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: The stairs are right there if you wanna try crossing the rubble.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: What's the point in even trying...?
Did you see how the road just...
The whole sector'll go...
I need to see my family.
No, not again. Please, no!
You should get away from there...
This place got hit too!?
Why would someone do this!?
It happened so fast... One moment he was there...
Then he wasn't.
Without Shinra's help, we're screwed!
Haha, it's all staged, isn't it? Good one...
And the noise! I'll never forget that noise!
Of all the sectors, why this one!?
Why won't anyone help me!?
I'm getting to that station if it kills me!
Why!? Why'd this have to happen!?
Just let me go home!
Get me out of here...please...
It...it just collapsed. Without any warning!
We have to believe in Shinra. Th-they'll make it all better.
At least the trains are still running.
I have to get home. I need to see my wife and kids.
Maybe we can climb over the debris?
Just breathe...
I'm gonna miss my train!
I should've taken the side streets!
Whoever did this is gonna pay.
Thought I was a goner...
My girlfriend's waiting for me at the station.
No more... Please...
Get me out of this place!
It's all just a dream...
Are we trapped here?
My baby's at the station!
I can't take this!
I have to get to the station. Right now.
Everything was fine, then...
What did we do to deserve this!?
My family! They're at the station!
The expressway was damaged too!?
I hope whoever did this is happy!
The road... It just...collapsed.
What if...what if it happens again...!?
Deep breaths, now. Deep breaths. Remember the training course. You can't afford to panic...
Just calm down...!
Shinra's going to do something about this...right?
Everyone...please remain calm!
One second later and...
Climb over the debris and the station's right there!
I just want to see my family again...
Did the explosion cause this too?
So this is how I die... Haha.
There has to be another way out.
I need to find my baby!
When will it stop!?
Do something! Before the trains stop!
Help! My arm! I think it's broken!
I'll never set foot on the plate again!
Is nowhere safe anymore!?
It's up to fate now...
I'm just worried about my kid...
I don't want to die...!
The whole sector's in ruins.
My knees are knocking...
It's no use...
Don't know how I survived this long...
They were coming to visit...
No... Please no...
I won't get on a train without her...
Please, find my daughter for me!
Please let her be safe. Please.
Might as well give up.
Help isn't on the way.
I don't have the strength to...
I've made my peace with it.
Shinra will save us, I know it!
No...
Mommy...
It's not fair...
There's no way we're getting through that mess. We should just turn back.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Naw, Shinra's on it.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Sure, we could try the alley, but is getting to the station really worth breaking our necks over?
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Yes, because we won't.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Shooting for the station?
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Take the alley and climb up to the roof of that building at the end and you're practically there.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: If you make it that far...
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Quickly! We have to get him out!
The military's on the way. Once they're here─
There's no time! He needs help now!
Why us!? What did we do to deserve this!?
Nothing! The people who did this are monsters!
What's going on!?
What's happening down there!?
You all right!?
Don't worry! The military will be here any minute!
Do you need any help!?
Don't panic!
Hey! What's going on out there!?
What the heck happened!?
You okay!?
Just tell me what you need and I'll bring it to you!
The rescue workers'll be here soon!
Everyone try to stay calm!
It's like the end of the world...
Unbelievable...
What'll become of us?
No matter what happens, I'm here for you.
Think you're ready to walk?
I'm sorry, Dad. I should've never said I wanted to come up here.
It's okay.
Have they put out the fires yet?
Not yet.
Wh-what if they reach us? What do we do then?
Oh, man. It's still spreading.
Sure hope the mako doesn't catch...
This is crazy...
Will Midgar ever be the same?
I'm so scared...
The reactor... It just... It just...
My friend works there...
What will happen to us now?
The station? Well, take that fire escape. It'll put you right on the street.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Once you're on the street, you'll want to head for the plaza with the fountain. Station's not too far.
data.speaker: Topside Resident

data.text: Mom, we wanna get our toys.
Not now, honey. I'm sorry.
But we can get them later, right? Right?
Sure you can. After this is all over.
Do what you like. I'm taking the kids to safety.
No, we stay together.
Yeah, together! I don't wanna leave without you!
Me too! I'm staying!
To think it would just collapse...
After all those years of construction...
The mayor can kiss his job goodbye.
So much for the fast way.
What didn't collapse?
How do they expect us to evacuate?
My friend's at the station.
Good thing I stayed put.
Just terrible...
So Shinra did know.
They blew up the expressway too.
The announcement said to leave.
Good. Military's here.
They'd better catch the bastards who did this.
I knew something like this would happen one day.
The fire won't spread this far, will it?
The president needs to make a statement.
We should be fine as long as Reactor 8 stays online.
City's on fire and the mayor does what?
Wait, we can't go through the plaza?
Guess I'm out of a job now... Shit.
Could've been me working that shift...
If you're looking for the station, you gotta go through the plaza, right?
Might as well stay, if you ask me.
The station? Gotta take the backstreets beyond the plaza.
I heard it's total chaos near the reactor.
I'm gonna leave, just to be safe.
My friend fled to Shinra HQ.
How am I gonna get home?
I came here to enjoy myself...
You think, maybe, it could've just been an accident?
I had a feeling something bad was going to happen...
Should I leave too?
I'd like to stay here, if I can.
Where's the mayor when we need him!?
We'll be fine now that the military's here.
The mako won't leak...will it?
Just my luck. The military won't let me through the plaza...
Why'd they blockade the plaza?
How are we supposed to catch the train?
Are the culprits still at large!?
Where's the shelter?
Where can we go that's safe?
Maybe it was really an equipment failure instead.
The president has some explaining to do.
No place safer than Shinra HQ.
Mako energy is a human right!
Huh, the damage isn't as bad as I thought.
The military's here. We're fine.
The president's going to fix this, you mark my words.
We're safe. Shinra's here.
The bastards who did this should fry.
The mayor's a lousy bum.
What's the president got to say about all this?
The fires can't reach us here.
This won't faze Shinra at all.
Shinra will protect us, won't they?
Could someone please tell me what's going on?
Can we go home now?
If I could, I'd hop one of those trains lickety-split.
Are the slums safe?
Has the president said anything?
You see the army guys? They've got guns!
There was a big "BOOM" and everything shook a lot!
So many army men...
No! No more 'splosions!
I must ask you to remain in the hotel along with the other guests.
But we want to know what's going on.
Better that than cowering inside.
Please─it is my responsibility to keep you safe and escort you to the shelter.
We'll wait for the military.
Yes, they will have been trained for this sort of thing.
The restaurant's in total disarray. Plates, glasses...not much hasn't been broken.
I'm sure that Shinra will compensate you for all that.
Why aren't you leaving too?
As a sailor would say, the captain goes down with the ship.
The real target was people like us, here on the plate.
What!?
Those filthy slum rats are jealous of everything we have.
You think so?
Could the mayor be behind this?
Huh!?
Maybe it's part of a plot to tarnish President Shinra's name.
Okaaay...
Wow... Who'da thunk there'd be people riding in the freight car? Guess they don't have much choice, but...rather them than me.
I just wanted to be alone...
Hm?
Quit it.
Hey!
Oh, sorry.
Oh.
The hell?
Watch it.
Huh?
Jerk.
What the─?
Sorry about that.
Stop that.
C'mon!
Lay off.
*sigh*
Huh?
Watch where you're going.
For the love of...
Wha?
Pardon me.
My apologies.
Woah.
Sorry!
So many people...
Ugh...
My bad.
Whoa.
Maybe the freight car's not so bad.
Hope the others made it...
The highway collapsed right in front of me.
I just wanna get home.
No guards here, right?
What a relief...
They won't kick us off, will they?
Do you think the slums are okay?
Finally, I can get home...
I wonder where they are now.
Whaddya mean it "exploded"!?
Are the slums alright?
They catch who did this?
Guess it's time to look for a new job...
You see the size of that fire?
It's like the end of days...
I'd heard there were anti-Shinra folks, but this...this is...
Hope nothing happened down below...
At least I still have a house.
Serves these assholes right for shitting on the slums.
Just lemme get home...
We don't need no reactors.
Shoulda gone to Sector 3 instead...
They even have hotels down there?
I haven't been down to the surface in years.
Sector 8 will be back to normal in no time. It has to be.
What if...other reactors were hit as well?
I'm gonna have nightmares about those fires.
Can't believe I'm excited to see the slums.
Glad it won't be me cleaning up the office...
All I wanna do is pass out.
We were out on a date when it happened.
Why would anyone do something like that?
The flames were brighter than the sun.
Thank goodness I made the train.
Guess the plate's not so safe.
They said it was an attack, but I'm not so sure.
Some people say Wutai's involved...
How dare they say they're doing this for the planet.
Could Avalanche really be behind all this?
I wanted the train for Sector 2...
Looks like I won't be getting home tonight.
Who knows what'll become of Sector 8.
Should've never gotten out of bed this morning. Just called in sick.
Do you think Wutai's to blame?
I can't believe I survived that. I was ready to die.
I doubt this'll be the last attack on a reactor...
You see, my daughter now lives in Sector 8, so...
Have they caught the perpetrators yet?
I can't wait to set foot on the surface.
Have you heard the rumors? Someone's trying to take down Shinra.
Will our house still be there?
I'll be nice and talk to my brothers.
Did Mr. Shinra catch the bad men yet?
The fire was really big.
Do you mind? I'm trying to work here.
data.speaker: Kyrie

data.text: Ugh, just leave me alone, all right?
data.speaker: Kyrie

data.text: Why don't you learn to take a hint, buddy?
data.speaker: Kyrie

data.text: Wait, what the... Huh, that's weird.
Uh oh... Phew, okay.

Hey!
Never mind. Sorry to disturb you.
Oh, that better not have been what I thought it was...
Sorry, I didn't mean to bump─ Huh?
Stop that right now!
No thief's getting my money.
Wait, where is it? ...Okay. Got it.
Are you the one who grabbed my sleeve?
Maybe some grounders did it as payback?
Don't be stupid.
Yeah. The slums need power too, you know.
Good thing there'll be electricity where we're going.
I'm sure Sector 7's affected too...
Naw, Shinra wouldn't let that happen.
Zzz...
Uh, I didn't hear anything. You gotta believe me!
Man, this train is slower than molasses, am I right?
Calm down... It's just a sword...
How much longer till the station!?
Oh dear...
T-time for a little nap.
Don't let him escape!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Give up!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Don't let him get away, no matter what!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Message from aerial recon. They want us to lock down the station area.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: I'd be better off trying my luck somewhere else.
data.speaker: Cloud
